content: get carried away this summer with the marlowe tote this fun and functional design works up quickly and is perfect for toting around all your summer essentials written in us terms materials 1 530 yards 7 skeins of lion brand rewind tape yarn in the color citronella or similar weight 5 yarn us size j 6mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors size 23 wide x 14 high x 5 deep this pattern is available for free on the meghan makes do blog 1 it is also available as a complete kit from lion brand yarn 2 1 https //www meghanmakesdo com/blog/the-marlowe-tote-free-crochet-pattern 2 https //shrsl com/3j2f3
